title: not a typical thriller, don't expect a mainstream movie
review:
The main theme is rape. So it is not a film for entertainment only. It is sometimes hard stuff, in psychological sense. Is it worth to watch it? Yes, but take time.

Conclusion: It is an exciting film with a serious background and a special fine end.

title: exiting movie with a serious topic
review:
Okay it is not a mainstream movie, but for the small budget it's a nice one. I enjoyed it the second time. The topic may not fit to everyone, but it's important to support this kind of movies.
I can't understand some people who wrote b*ll*h*t about thos movie.

title: Slow burn, untalented lots
review: I have wasted few minutes of my life watching this movie, I say few because I kept fast forwarding it , it is a low budget with untalented wannabees from the director to the last actor
